      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tile[] Deck.drawHand()
      Draw an entire hand from the deck
      Tile Deck.drawTile()
      Gets one tile from the deck
      Tile[][] Board.getBoard()
      get the current fields of the board
      Tile Board.getField(int xValue, int yValue)
      gets a field
      Tile[] Player.getHand()
      gives the current hand (an array of tiles) of the player
      Tile Deck.swapTile(Tile tile)
      Swaps one tile from the deck
